item.description:
The Red Shoes-a fabulously restored film which several people told me I should post. Movie starts at 7:30. I'll wait in the lobby.

Written, directed and produced by Michael Powell and Emeric Pressburger for J. Arthur Rank. Choreography by Robert Helpmann and Leonide Massine. Cast: Moira Shearer, Anton Walbrook, Marius Goring, Robert Helpmann, Leonide Massine, Ludmilla Tcherina.
Cinestudio is pleased to present a ravishingly restored TechnicolorÂ® print of Michael Powell's brilliant tribute to the world of dance! The Red Shoes captured the imagination of a generation of young girls (and boys) by introducing them to the magical world of ballet. Based on Hans Christian Anderson's fairy tale, it stars the flame-haired Moira Shearer as a stunning young ballerina and Anton Walbrook as the Diaghilev-like impresario who makes his dancers choose between life and art. "Truly the most beautiful Technicolor picture ever made." - Martin Scorsese. 133 min.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby at 7:15 pm or so. I'll be on the bench.
